text: I personally have largely moved away from BSON.jl to JLD2.jl. Not only it happens that one of the devs is also a dev of DrWatson, but I also had several "ignored issues" with BSON in the past that made me lose trust.

elements.text: I personally have largely moved away from BSON.jl to JLD2.jl. Not only it happens that one of the devs is also a dev of DrWatson, but I also had several "ignored issues" with BSON in the past that made me lose trust.

text: Just some more info here. I thought it was a v1.6rc1 issue. But turns out BSON.jl upgraded to 0.3.0 recently and loading any of my bson files fail in v1.5.3 is well. If I revert back to BSON 0.2.6, things are fine.

elements.text: Just some more info here. I thought it was a v1.6rc1 issue. But turns out BSON.jl upgraded to 0.3.0 recently and loading any of my bson files fail in v1.5.3 is well. If I revert back to BSON 0.2.6, things are fine.
